TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHostEnvironment implements class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IChannelProvider, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IExceptionContext, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IProgressChannelProvider
Public Interface IHostEnvironment Implements IChannelProvider, IProgressChannelProvider
type IHostEnvironment = interface interface IChannelProvider interface IExceptionContext interface IProgressChannelProvider

Docs.summary: The host environment interface creates hosts for components. Note that the methods of this interface should be called from the main thread for the environment. To get an environment to service another thread, call Fork and pass the return result to that thread.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ComponentCatalog As ComponentCatalog

Docs.summary: The catalog of loadable components () that are available in this host.
